name: mosaic-framework
description: A front-end JavaScript library for creating user interfaces

scripts.move-declarations: cp ts-build/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && cp ts-build/options.d.ts dist/options.d.ts && cp ts-build/router.d.ts dist/router.d.ts && cp ts-build/portfolio.d.ts dist/portfolio.d.ts
scripts.build: tsc && parcel build ts-build/index.js --no-source-maps --out-dir dist --global Mosaic && npm run move-declarations && rm -f dist/index.js.map
scripts.bnd: npm run build && npm run deploy && git checkout dev

author: Adeola Uthman
